title: Peace - Volume 02
description: A collection of 15 unique peaceful background music.
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Peace - Volume 02" is a collection of 15 unique ambient music backgrounds with an intimate, soft and positive mood ideal for your social games, meditation, adventures, space calling, aerials and many more categories.

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements. 


Each track is presented with many loops for further editing.


Celestial Piano: Full length (02:03), 8 Loops, Intro&Outro

Bed Of Clouds: Full length (03:24), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Dreaming In Peace: Full length (06:42), 11 Loops, Intro&Outro

Dreamy Nights: Full length (02:09), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Empty Spaces: Full length (01:58), 4 Loops, Intro&Outro

Flat Oceans: Full length (02:20), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Flowing River: Full length (05:28), 10 Loops, Intro&Outro

Here And Now: Full length (04:40), 9 Loops, Intro&Outro

Light Streams: Full length (01:55), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Lotus Flowers: Full length (01:25), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Meditate And Dream: Full length (02:15), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Peace Of Mind: Full length (01:03), 8 Loops, Intro&Outro

Sea Of Stars: Full length (02:18), 10 Loops, Intro&Outro

Sunshower: Full length (02:11), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Times Of Change: Full length (04:52), 9 Loops, Intro&Outro


Feel free to contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further editing and additional versions.
